October.text: Group members come to school dressed like tourists (camera, glasses, hats, etc)

November.text: Every member MUST be wearing the same shirt/outfit

December.text:
~But in reverse!~
Girls wear suits and guys wear dresses

January.text:
Appropriate bathing suits/ beachwear
Get a picture of squad in the snow with bathing suits on = 2x points

February.text:
Wear Onesies to school ~don’t forget the piñata~
video required

March.text: Wear all black: everything black (no other colors, neck to feet black)

April.text:
Make a freshman’s day by dressing up in santa hats and giving a random freshman a present
video required

May.text: Costumes, decorations, trick or treating (the whole deal)

June.text: Videotape squad singing a High School Musical song in the hall. Get other students involved = 2x points
